title: Someone stole my account
body: Yesterday i went to login into league but i couldn't. I tried to change the password but it didn't show up in my inbox. So i went to check online to see if I had the right email address and it was something random. I left myself logged in on the lol website so that's how I'm able to post this but I really need help guys. If you have any advice on how to get my account pls comment.

replies.body: someone stole my main acount my name was killer2a wat hapened i clicked some link and then it kicked me out of the game and send to all my frends this link and now i cant login back to my acount

We can't assist with account recoveries here on the H&S, but if you reach out in a support ticket using [**this form**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416), one of our recovery specialists will be able to assist you. Be sure to provide as much detail about your account as possible for a quicker recovery.

Let me know if you have any questions.
if riot doesnt comment, then i suggest you email them for a faster response
